channel.title: [PI] Prayer Draining + Multiple prayers at once help
channel.description: When I take off my prayer it keeps draining. Anyone know what method i use to resolve this? Also, you can use multiple prayers such as eagle eye, mystic might, ultimate strength, incredible reflexes all at once. Plus whenever you put on piety or chivalry on and switch weapons, it turns itself off. Help please. Just telling me the class file and the method would help!

item.title: [PI] Prayer Draining + Multiple prayers at once help
item.dc:creator: @hahabob2 hahabob2
item.source: [PI] Prayer Draining + Multiple prayers at once help
